questions.question: What is a linked list?
answers: A data structure that allows for sequential storage and access of elements.
A data structure that allows for random storage of elements.
A data structure that allows for ordered storage of elements.
A data structure that allows for hierarchical storage and access of elements.

questions.question: What is the name of the operation that removes the element at the beginning of a linked list?
What is a circular linked list?
answers: A linked list in which the last node points to the first node.
A linked list in which each node has two pointers, one to the next node and one to the previous node.
A linked list in which the nodes are arranged in a tree-like structure.
A linked list in which each node has only one pointer to the next node.

questions.question: What is the name of the operation that inserts an element at the end of a linked list?
